name: Packet_Loss (Jenoah)
description:
--== NOTE ==--

It is STRONGLY advised to download the game as audio doesn't loop correctly in the web build.

--== Description ==--

Packet_Loss is a game in which you will become a network engineer who has to deal with an abrupt server problem. While the server is rebooting, you must manually manage all incoming and outgoing connections yourself. 

Most of the task start of simple, but as connections keep coming in, pressure can really build up.

On top of that, the network you are operating on is pretty unstable, so every mistake you make will result in packet loss. The more packets you lose, the more latency you will get, resulting in a delay of your actions to the computer.

   
Good luck engineer!
